snippet: DWYER--Curtis Tredwell, of Darien, CT and Lawrence, NY, teacher and father, died on April 27th, 2016, surrounded by his family. He was a graduate of The Gunnery School, Trinity College (BA), and Manhattanville College (MA). Son of the late John Charles McCarthy and Sheila Browne McCarthy of Lawrence, NY, he is survived by his two children, Casey Dwyer of Philadelphia, PA and Madeline Dwyer of Darien, CT, his sister Winifred Post, of San Francisco, CA, and his brother Robert McCarthy of Safety Harbor, FL. A small service for family and friends is planned for late May. In lieu of flowers, donations to Mercy Hospital, Rockville Center, NY would be appreciated. 1/3
